sections.heading: or amendment of release.A powerholder may revoke or amend a release of a power of appointment only to the extent that:(1) the instrument of release is revocable by the powerholder; or(2) the powerholder reserves a power of revocation or amendment in the instrument of release

sections.text:
30-4628.Revocation or amendment of release.

A powerholder may revoke or amend a release of a power of appointment only to the extent that:

(1) the instrument of release is revocable by the powerholder; or

(2) the powerholder reserves a power of revocation or amendment in the instrument of release.

SourceLaws 2021, LB501, ยง 51.
